name: Disney's The Lion King
description: Disney The Lion King brings to life the majesty and mystery of Africa through the tale of Simba, a lion cub faced with the challenging transition to maturity. Now, you too can be part of the adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Video Card w/ 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 9 MB available space
